# Reference

<!-- DO NOT EDIT: This document was generated by Puppet Strings -->

## Table of Contents

### Classes

#### Public Classes

* [`opensearch_dashboards`](#opensearch_dashboards): Module to manage OpensSearch Dashboards

#### Private Classes

* `opensearch_dashboards::config`: Configure OpenSearch Dashboards.
* `opensearch_dashboards::install`: Installs OpenSearch Dashboards via archive, package, or repository.
* `opensearch_dashboards::install::archive`: Install OpenSearch Dashboards via tarball.
* `opensearch_dashboards::install::package`: Install OpenSearch Dashboards via deb/rpm package.
* `opensearch_dashboards::repository`: Handle OpenSearch Dashboards repository.
* `opensearch_dashboards::repository::debian`: Install the Debian apt repository for OpenSearch Dashboards.
* `opensearch_dashboards::repository::redhat`: Install the RedHat yum repository for OpenSearch Dashboards.
* `opensearch_dashboards::service`: Handle OpenSearch Dashboards service.

## Classes

### <a name="opensearch_dashboards"></a>`opensearch_dashboards`

Module to manage OpensSearch Dashboards

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `opensearch_dashboards` class:

* [`version`](#-opensearch_dashboards--version)
* [`manage_package`](#-opensearch_dashboards--manage_package)
* [`package_directory`](#-opensearch_dashboards--package_directory)
* [`package_ensure`](#-opensearch_dashboards--package_ensure)
* [`package_source`](#-opensearch_dashboards--package_source)
* [`pin_package`](#-opensearch_dashboards--pin_package)
* [`apt_pin_priority`](#-opensearch_dashboards--apt_pin_priority)
* [`manage_repository`](#-opensearch_dashboards--manage_repository)
* [`repository_ensure`](#-opensearch_dashboards--repository_ensure)
* [`repository_location`](#-opensearch_dashboards--repository_location)
* [`repository_gpg_key`](#-opensearch_dashboards--repository_gpg_key)
* [`manage_config`](#-opensearch_dashboards--manage_config)
* [`settings`](#-opensearch_dashboards--settings)
* [`manage_service`](#-opensearch_dashboards--manage_service)
* [`service_ensure`](#-opensearch_dashboards--service_ensure)
* [`service_enable`](#-opensearch_dashboards--service_enable)
* [`restart_on_config_change`](#-opensearch_dashboards--restart_on_config_change)
* [`restart_on_package_change`](#-opensearch_dashboards--restart_on_package_change)

##### <a name="-opensearch_dashboards--version"></a>`version`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

The version to be installed

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-opensearch_dashboards--manage_package"></a>`manage_package`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether to manage the package installation

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-opensearch_dashboards--package_directory"></a>`package_directory`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`

The directory to install the package. Only used for package_install_method = 'archive'

Default value: `'/opt/opensearch-dashboards'`

##### <a name="-opensearch_dashboards--package_ensure"></a>`package_ensure`

Data type: `Enum['present', 'absent']`

The status of the package

Default value: `'present'`

##### <a name="-opensearch_dashboards--package_source"></a>`package_source`

Data type: `Enum['archive', 'download', 'repository']`

The source for the package

Default value: `'repository'`

##### <a name="-opensearch_dashboards--pin_package"></a>`pin_package`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether to enable the `apt::pin` or `yum::versionlock` for the package

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-opensearch_dashboards--apt_pin_priority"></a>`apt_pin_priority`

Data type: `Integer`

The priority for apt::pin of the opensearch-dashboards package

Default value: `1001`

##### <a name="-opensearch_dashboards--manage_repository"></a>`manage_repository`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether to manage the package repository

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-opensearch_dashboards--repository_ensure"></a>`repository_ensure`

Data type: `Enum['present', 'absent']`

The status of the repository

Default value: `'present'`

##### <a name="-opensearch_dashboards--repository_location"></a>`repository_location`

Data type: `Optional[Stdlib::HTTPUrl]`

The location of the repository

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-opensearch_dashboards--repository_gpg_key"></a>`repository_gpg_key`

Data type: `Stdlib::HTTPUrl`

The GnuPG key of the repository

Default value: `'https://artifacts.opensearch.org/publickeys/opensearch.pgp'`

##### <a name="-opensearch_dashboards--manage_config"></a>`manage_config`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether to manage the configuration

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-opensearch_dashboards--settings"></a>`settings`

Data type: `Hash`

Custom settings for OpenSearch Dashboards

Default value: `{}`

##### <a name="-opensearch_dashboards--manage_service"></a>`manage_service`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether to manage the opensearch-dashboards service

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-opensearch_dashboards--service_ensure"></a>`service_ensure`

Data type: `Stdlib::Ensure::Service`

The state for the opensearch-dashboards service

Default value: `'running'`

##### <a name="-opensearch_dashboards--service_enable"></a>`service_enable`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether to enable the service

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-opensearch_dashboards--restart_on_config_change"></a>`restart_on_config_change`

Data type: `Boolean`

Restart the service on any config changes

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-opensearch_dashboards--restart_on_package_change"></a>`restart_on_package_change`

Data type: `Boolean`

Restart the service on package changes

Default value: `true`
